name: single-spa-example-rxjs-shared-state
description: single-spa example that shows how to use a utility module to share some application state across other microfrontends

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy deploy/auth deploy/home deploy/login deploy/navbar
scripts.postbuild: cp packages/root-config/dist/* deploy && cp packages/auth/dist/* deploy/auth && cp packages/home/dist/* deploy/home && cp packages/login/dist/* deploy/login && cp packages/navbar/dist/* deploy/navbar
